text: Henry IV, Pt. 2 is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a history play. Shakespeare's source was The Chronicles of England, Scotland and Ireland by Raphael Holinshed. It was probably first acted on 3 March 1592. It was probably first printed in 1594.Henry IV, Pt. 2 ==References== Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:Plays based on English history Category:1590s plays
title: Henry IV, Pt. 2
